messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1657
messages.msgSnippet: Limericks, perhaps? One of my favorite childhood memories is writing letters back and forth with my grandmother.  We
messages.messageBody:
<<maybe we need to find some fun poems>>

Limericks, perhaps?

One of my favorite childhood memories is writing letters back and forth with
my grandmother. We did everything in limerick form. It was so much fun.

Julie

Limericks are a good possibility.......That reminded me how much fun we had
last spring helping her 12yo friend with homework. The assignment was to
write haiku.....the friend did the writing and oldest dd came up with quite
a few ideas.
Susan......the unschooling Mom to whom most of the neighborhood children
come for assistance with 'school' projects!

________________________________________________________________________
